General.Name: Forest Road Acquisition Corp II
General.Description: Forest Road Acquisition Corp. II does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify businesses in the areas of technology, media, and telecommunications industry. The company was formerly known as Forest Road Acquisition Corp. III and changed its name to Forest Road Acquisition Corp. II in January 2021. Forest Road Acquisition Corp. II was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 1177 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10036
